name: First Person Tetris
description:
You, secret agent extraordinaire and single mother of two. KAREN have been captured once again by Dr.Retro. Can you climb to the top and escape in this retro themed platforming puzzle?

Move with WASD
Look With Mouse
Jump and Walljump with Spacebar
Shift Pieces with Q and E
Rotate them with R
Quick Drop them with Tab
Change Perspectives with T

Thank You to Karl Casey of

White Bat Audio

For the use of the song Inception
